ygData.subject: Re: Rarely mentioned fact...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is the way we do it. One warrior per extra giant. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity. GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Jan 17/00, kim@... wrote:
>
> We didn't get a chance to try varying strategies, but I
> suspect having one tank (someone with parry and riposte) per
> extra giant would save the clerics a lot of mana. Another
> option may be rooting the extras some distance away (assuming
> they can be rooted).

This is the way we do it. One warrior per extra giant.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
